page.title: 13ARABLE FARMING IN SAMPFORD
page.content: Most of the farms are arable farms.A large amount of cereal crops are grown,Together with various break crops. The land in our area is very suitable for wheat growing.Farms produce top quality wheat for flour and for baking.Also wheat of a lesser quality for flour for biscuits and for animal feed. Barley grows well as a secondary crop.Our farm land produces top quality Barley for malting for beer making.Lesser quality barley goes for animal feed shults. A fair number of farms grow some acres of peas.Bolt for human and animal consumption. Black eye beans are grown as a break crop.These are sold for animal feed or exported to countries like Egypt who use them for flour production.
